actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a limitation on the application of the affiliated service group rules of section 414(m) of such Code in the case of certain bona fide business transactions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make affiliated service group rules concerning employee benefit requirements inapplicable for certain transactions.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a limitation on the application of the affiliated service group rules of section 414(m) of such Code in the case of certain bona fide business transactions.
